divs: sighting detailsa large oval shaped pattern of blue, red flashing lights, with white strobe lights spotted hovering over a tree line at 2 to 3 miles west of i-75 at mile marker 178 \ e. newburg road. the pattern of lights suggested a very large object was hovering stationary over the ground. flashing white strobe lights alerted me to the object. i then observed large blue and red flashing lights around the perimiter of the object, along with the white strobes. the lights flashed in some sort if intermittent or undefined pattern, with the white strobes defining an outline, and the red and blue lights flashing within the outline. another object was spotted very high up in the air, perhaps at 20 to 30000 feet or more, flying just south of the object. this may possibly have been a commercial airliner. the object appeared to be hovering at an altitude of maybe a couple of thousand feet, to at most 3000 feet. the size of the object would have been hand sized, with the hand held at arms length, minus the thumb.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Bay City
There were no other sightings in Bay City on or around September 21st 2008
Summary: LARGE Oval Pattern of Blue, Red, and white flashing lights
